tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Children's Health,Pediatric Vaccinations,Paediatric care,All Pediatric Problems ,
review: We have been consulting Dr Radhalakshmi for the past 2 years. She is never in a hurry, takes ample time to check my child and explains everything in detail. My daughter cries a lot when placed in a hospital environment. But, the Doctor remains patient and tries to assuage her with lolly pops and lovely talks.  She is not only child friendly, but also parent friendly. She grasps what is going on within us and makes sure to clear all the doubts. More and more doctors like her are needed for our society.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We have been consulting Dr.Radhalakshmi for the past 6years. 
My daughter adores her .She explains everything clearly and is very patient with children.
She is very experienced since I know her from NICU .
Very patient and answers all questions.
Very helpful in guiding new mothers.Highly recommended.

tags: None
review:
Dr. RADHA is very caring,effective and friendly paediatrician for kids with mild medication and proper parental guidance.

I recommended. Dr. RADHA is one of the best paediatrician we never ever never experienced.


R. Senthil & Selvi
Parents of. Sai Danvand

tags: None
review: I have been visiting Dr Radhalakshmi for almost three years for consultation for two of my daughters. She's very calm and composed while diagnosing, getting all the minute details clear from us and explains clearly on treatment. She understands what we parents will go through and  keeps us reassured. She's always gotta smiling face. I will definitely recommend Dr Radhalakshmi.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went twice for vaccination and once for fever n cough for my kid. The receptionist was so rude and makes faces if u ask for anything (feeding room in my case) they follow first come serve, there is no point in taking prior appointment and the doctor is in a hurry to send u out that she never listened fully. Treatment was good but experience was really bad
